description:
Tamaki`s motivation is presented in the form of her TV superhero, Blade Braver. Miyako Miyazaki, Yuuji Nakata, Danjuurou Eiga join the club. Tamaki`s relationship with the other club members develop when they start having lunch together and sharing their boxed lunches. Her everyday boxed lunch, however, consisted of a single umeboshi (pickled ume fruit) and rice, which she constantly made in honor of her parents, and couldn`t share with the others. She start making "shareable" boxed lunches at the end of the episode, even though she feels she`s disrespecting her parents a little.
Source: Wiki

titles.title: The Blade Bravers and Boxed Lunch
ブレードブレイバーとお弁当
